imdb.plot outline: The Hit List is our hot list of international musical artists and groups. Themed episodes profile big stars and exciting newcomers alike. This really is the ultimate collection of mini biographies on those musical artists who have kept us entertained with their personality, talent, antics, lifestyle and occasionally controversial behavior.
imdb.title: The Hit List
plot: _The Hit List_ (qv) is our hot list of international musical artists and groups. Themed episodes profile big stars and exciting newcomers alike. This really is the ultimate collection of mini biographies on those musical artists who have kept us entertained with their personality, talent, antics, lifestyle and occasionally controversial behavior.
